hooks.command: current_dir=$(pwd); voice_db="$HOME/.claude/voice-db.json"; if [ -f "$voice_db" ] && [ "$(jq -r --arg dir "$current_dir" '.[$dir] // false' "$voice_db")" = "true" ]; then transcript_path=$(cat | jq -r '.transcript_path'); tail -1 "$transcript_path" | jq -r '.message.content[0].text // empty' | say & fi
